p: The French GeoSentinel Marseille site reported a CHIKV confirmed infection acquired in Maldives in December 2019 [ 7]; five additional cases imported to Denmark, Germany, and Spain in 2019 were retrospectively identified in the EuroTravNet/GeoSentinel Surveillance Network's database. Other 2 cases were reported in Italy in the first months of 2020. We present the characteristics of these eight cases and discuss aspects of this re-emergence of CHIKV in touristic areas of the Maldives.
